channel.title: Comments on: Slow-Cooked Beef and Mushroom Pie – Daring Bakers Challenge October 2013

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: This pie was delicious!! Like Anita I also love pies and this was especially tasty and the meat was tender.
item.content:encoded: This pie was delicious!! Like Anita I also love pies and this was especially tasty and the meat was tender.

item.title: By: Maggie Smith
item.dc:creator: Maggie Smith
item.description:
Wow!!! That's what I call a pie!! Love what you did and will try to make one at home, but for when we have visitors I think.
Thanks
Maggie
item.content:encoded:
Wow!!! That’s what I call a pie!! Love what you did and will try to make one at home, but for when we have visitors I think.

Thanks

Maggie
